doc.after: The Principality of Serbia was a state in the Balkans that came into existence as a result of the Serbian revolution which lasted between 1804 and 1817. Despite brutal oppression and retaliation by the Ottoman authorities, the revolutionary leaders, first KaraÄorÄe and then MiloÅ¡ ObrenoviÄ, succeeded in their goal to liberate Serbia after centuries of Turkish rule.
